description: The first onboarding stage that introduces the Just Pray experience with space for multi-step copy and animation.

stages.title: Let the noise settle.
stages.body: We built Just Pray to give you a calm, focused rhythm for prayer, even on your busiest days.

stages.title: We guide every step.
stages.body: From scripture to tailored prompts, each moment is crafted so you always know where to begin.

stages.title: Let's shape your journey.
stages.body: Answer a few quick questions so we can tune your prayer time around your life and the people who matter most.
